name: paper-checkbox

checked.name: checked
checked.description: Gets or sets the state, `true` is checked and `false` is unchecked.

label.name: label
label.description: The label for the radio button.

toggles.name: toggles
toggles.description:
Normally the user cannot uncheck the radio button by tapping once
checked.  Setting this property to `true` makes the radio button
toggleable from checked to unchecked.

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description: If true, the user cannot interact with this element.

change.name: change
change.description: Fired when the checked state changes due to user interaction.

core-change.name: core-change
core-change.description: Fired when the checked state changes.
